attributes.action: I want a referendum on independence from Scotland. Im tired of the SNP threats
attributes.additional_details:
I believe strongly in the Union but enough is enough and its time for this matter to be finally settled. Please sign this petition because I'm tired of the sabre rattling Sturgeon and her band of nationalist. I don't get free prescriptions and free education, lets see how they do without the UK backing them. 

Thanks
attributes.background: The union of England, Scotland, Wales & Northern Ireland is arguable one of the greatest success in the modern age. Our great country is slowly being eroded away. The SNP do not look beyond the horizon. I'm tired of the SNP, I call for the people of England to vote to eject Scotland from the union.
